pixels.script:
local time = os.datetable()

if (event.type == 'interrupt' and event.iid == 'update') or
   ((event.type == 'on' or event.type == 'off') and event.pin == 'c') then

   port.a = pin.c and mem.activations[math.floor(time.hour / 10) + 1]
   interrupt(60 * (60 - time.min) + (60 - time.sec), 'update')

elseif event.type == 'program' then
    mem.activations = {true, false, true, true, true, true, true, true, true, true}
    interrupt(1, 'update')
end
